name: Bánh mì chả (Pork Sausage)
description: A classic Vietnamese sandwich staple.

name: Bánh mì gà satay halal
description: Marinated chicken, prepared to be halal-friendly.

name: Bánh mì thịt nướng (Grilled Pork)
description: Chargrilled pork with traditional pickled vegetables.

name: Bánh mì bò lá lốt (Betel Leaf Beef)
description: Savory beef wrapped in aromatic betel leaves.

name: Xôi mặn (Savory Sticky Rice)
description: A hearty mix of meats, egg, and sausage.

name: Xôi thịt nướng (Pork Sticky Rice)
description: Grilled pork served with fragrant scallion oil.

name: Xôi chiên (Fried Sticky Rice)
description: Crispy rice patty, complemented by pork floss.

name: Bánh gối (Fried Dumpling, 2 pcs)
description: Dumplings filled with pork, glass noodles, and vegetables.

name: Gỏi cuốn thịt nướng (Pork Rolls, 2)
description: Fresh rice paper rolls with grilled pork and herbs.

name: Gỏi cuốn bò lá lốt (Beef Rolls, 2)
description: Betel leaf beef, fresh rice paper, and aromatic herbs.

name: Gỏi xoài (Mango Salad)
description: A refreshing salad with mango, herbs, and peanuts.

name: Gỏi gà (Chicken Salad)
description: Poached chicken, crisp cabbage, and fresh herbs.

name: Gỏi heo (Pork Salad)
description: Pork and cabbage with a savory fish sauce dressing.

name: Cà phê (Vietnamese Coffee)
description: Robusta coffee with sweetened condensed milk.

name: Trà đào (Peach Tea)
description: Black tea infused with peach syrup and fruit.

name: Kem bơ (Avocado Ice Cream)
description: Avocado, coconut, and condensed milk dessert.

name: Bún thịt nướng (Grilled Pork Noodle)
description: Grilled pork, herbs, and pickled vegetables.

name: Bún chả giò (Noodle w/ Spring Roll)
description: Noodles with fried dumplings as topping.

name: Cơm tấm (Broken Rice w/ Pork)
description: Grilled pork, egg, and pickles on broken rice.

name: Chả giò (Fried Spring Rolls, 2 pcs)
description: Classic pork spring rolls with glass noodles.

name: Gỏi cuốn chay (Veggie Spring Rolls)
description: Vegetarian rolls with tofu and vermicelli.

name: Xôi gà (Chicken Sticky Rice)
description: Poached chicken with scallion oil on sticky rice.

name: Gỏi cuốn tôm (Shrimp Spring Rolls, 2)
description: Shrimp spring rolls with lettuce and herbs.

name: Bánh mì chay (Veggie Banh Mi)
description: Tofu, mushrooms, and pickled veggies in baguette.

name: Chè ba màu (Three-color Dessert)
description: Vietnamese dessert with beans, jelly, coconut milk.

name: Nước mía (Sugarcane Juice)
description: Fresh sugarcane juice. Refreshing and sweet.
